Modul processor

Package de.kaiser.processor.reader

package de.kaiser.processor.reader
Contains classes responsible for reading and parsing external configuration files.

These classes act as the primary input layer for the application. They use the Jackson library to deserialize JSON streams into the application's internal data models, such as Document or StyleSheet. This package also defines the common JsonReadException for consistent error handling during these operations.

  • Zugehörige Packages
    Package
    Beschreibung
    de.kaiser.processor
    Contains the core processing services that orchestrate the main business logic of the application.
  • Klasse
    Beschreibung
    DocumentReader
    A utility class for reading documents from JSON input streams and deserializing them into Document objects.
    FontFamilyListReader
    Reads and parses a JSON stream into a FontFamilyList object.
    JsonReadException
    Should be thrown if a json-file is not readable.
    StyleSheetReader
